name: dehn-hackathon
description: DEHN Hackathon - Multi-service document processing application

scripts.dev:local: npm run env:check && concurrently -n "PDF,Backend,Frontend" -c "magenta,blue,green" "npm run dev:pdf" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:services: npm run env:check && concurrently -n "PDF,Backend" -c "magenta,blue" "npm run dev:pdf" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:pdf: cd services/pdf-processor && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.env:check: node -e "if(!require('fs').existsSync('.env.local')){console.error('❌ .env.local not found! Run npm run setup first.');process.exit(1);}console.log('✅ Environment configured');"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:apps
scripts.test:pdf-zip: curl -X POST -F "file=@example-files/example-manual.pdf" -F "extract_images=true" http://localhost:3095/extract/zip --output pdf-test-result.zip && echo 'ZIP file saved as pdf-test-result.zip'
scripts.deploy:gcp: npm run terraform:build && npm run terraform:apply
